Package thewizardstower

Class Floor

java.lang.Object
thewizardstower.Floor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Surrounding
public class Floor extends Object
This class represents the floor class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected ArrayList<Character>
    characterList
    This refers to the list of characters currently found in the floor level.
    protected boolean
    conquered
    Yhis is a boolean that determines if a floor has been conquered by the user or not.
    protected String
    description
    This refers to the current stage of the floor.
    protected ArrayList<String>
    elementList
    This refers to the list of types of power elements involved in the level.
    protected ArrayList<Enemy>
    enemyList
    This refers to the list of enemies currently found in the floor level.
    protected static String
    name
    This refers for the given name for the level.
    protected String
    stage
    This refers to the current stage of the floor.

  • Constructor Details

    • Floor

      public Floor(String name, String description, ArrayList<String> elementList, ArrayList<Character> characterList, ArrayList<Enemy> enemyList, String stage)
      This constructor creates a new floor instant with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the floor
      description - The given description for the floor
      elementList - The list of elements found in the floor, which dictates the type of items, weapons, and enemies found in the floor
      characterList - The list of characters currently found in the floor
      enemyList - The list of enemies currently found in the floor
      Stage - The current stage of the floor
